pullrequest.title: Update to match new MATLAB API

content.raw:
~~I had to put `<install>/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave` in my `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`. Is that expected?~~

~~Never mind. I did something wrong. It works.~~

I really had to run this command inside octave: `addpath('~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave')`

Or run octave from `'~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave'`

Adding paths to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` didn't work for me.
content.html:
I had to put <install>/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave in my LD_LIBRARY_PATH. Is that expected?

Never mind. I did something wrong. It works.

I really had to run this command inside octave: addpath('~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave')

Or run octave from '~/local/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/octave'

Adding paths to LD_LIBRARY_PATH didn't work for me.
